amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to carry out the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.
amendment.purpose: To prohibit the use of funds to carry out the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

action.text: Amendment SA 30 proposed by Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 26.

vote.text: Amendment SA 30 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 52. Record Vote Number: 34.
